https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/838vLo4GjXwj5GIwhfhFJNM3xmH.jpg This short film focuses on the homosexual relationship between two friends that takes center stage in northern India. It focuses the real issues that LGBT community faces this days in India. COD-City of Dreams
